name: v0.24.0
body:
## v0.24.0 - 2025-10-08
#### Features
- **(cd)** enable automatic publish to BCR - (13033db) - Aleksander Gondek
#### Miscellaneous Chores
- **(version)** v0.24.0 - (51da9bf) - Github Actions


## Usage example

### Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_cc_hdrs_map", version = "v0.24.0")
```

### WORKSPACE (deprecated)

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cc_hdrs_map",
    sha256 = "d6f42e469a8ea4498dfe1be22937ae964fde6fc2550d185fe1adb75593a18389",
    url = "https://github.com/AleksanderGondek/rules_cc_hdrs_map/releases/download/v0.24.0/rules_cc_hdrs_map-v0.24.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_cc_hdrs_map//cc_hdrs_map:workspace_deps.bzl", "cc_hdrs_map_workspace_deps")
cc_hdrs_map_workspace_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* feat(cd): enable automatic publish to BCR by @AleksanderGondek in https://github.com/AleksanderGondek/rules_cc_hdrs_map/pull/39


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AleksanderGondek/rules_cc_hdrs_map/compare/v0.23.0...v0.24.0

name: v0.23.0
body:
## v0.23.0 - 2025-10-08
#### Features
- **(ci)** switch publish logic to bazel-contrib one - (7d38454) - Aleksander Gondek
#### Miscellaneous Chores
- **(version)** v0.23.0 - (ff58244) - Github Actions


## Usage example

### Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_cc_hdrs_map", version = "v0.23.0")
```

### WORKSPACE (deprecated)

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_cc_hdrs_map",
    sha256 = "ce58e4d7ae89adf3d410119c69c18ed843b075000174e0aabf4289eae2492dfe",
    url = "https://github.com/AleksanderGondek/rules_cc_hdrs_map/releases/download/v0.23.0/rules_cc_hdrs_map-v0.23.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_cc_hdrs_map//cc_hdrs_map:workspace_deps.bzl", "cc_hdrs_map_workspace_deps")
cc_hdrs_map_workspace_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/AleksanderGondek/rules_cc_hdrs_map/compare/v0.22.1...v0.23.0
